about-me: Hello. My name is Amiko. I am 23 years old. I live in Tbilisi. I intend to become a front-end developer, and I will follow the front-end until the end. I studied 5 months in IT-Academy-Step-Georgia, I passed Html Css Javascript here. Then I studied in Tbilisi school of communication 2 months ReactJs. I am motivated, I want to be in touch with real projects to deepen my knowledge. I want to do an internship and then get a job.
